nodes.text: A Gamorrean sow acted as the wife of Jubnuk, one of the nine Gamorrean guards employed by Jabba Desilijic Tiure at his Jabba's Palace. She also acted as the mother to some children. On what was ultimately Jubnuk's last day under the employment of Jabba, he left for work and bid his wife and children goodbye while they were playing Droids and guards.
